circlestates.name: 李白
circlestates.head: img/headpic/libai.jpg
circlestates.content: 日出汨罗欲赛龙，遥祭屈原投江中！

circlestates.name: 老司机
circlestates.head: img/headpic/laosiji.jpg
circlestates.content: 想到节假日出行堵，没想到节假日前一天也这么堵

circlestates.name: 小明
circlestates.head: img/headpic/xiaoming.jpg
circlestates.content: 今天马上要高考了，我还没睡着！好担心呀！高考完了我就得升五年级了

circlestates.name: 刘德华
circlestates.head: img/headpic/liudehua.jpg
circlestates.content: 周末好多人啊，看来我的人气还是很旺啊
